    • findLastProcessHistory

      public IQueryBeanResult findLastProcessHistory(BatchProcessType type, int lastNumDays)
      This will get the process histories for the last x days for a given batch process. Note that this returns only these batch processes which actually ran (do not want to show zeros on the chart)
